content.description: A new town was incorporated in 1960. The size of the town’s population was recorded every 5 years after 1960. Using the variables <math alttext="x" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></math>, for number of years since 1960, and <math alttext="y" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></math>, for the size of the population, three models were created to predict the population from the number of years since 1960.
content.question: Model I predicts <math alttext="y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> from <math alttext="x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. Model II predicts <math alttext="the natural log of y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mo>(</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>, the natural logarithm of <math alttext="y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, from <math alttext="x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. Model III predicts <math alttext="the natural log of y" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mo>(</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> from <math alttext="the natural log of x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>. The following graphs show the residual plot for each model. Residual Plot for Model I Residual Plot for Model II Residual Plot for Model III Which of the following statements is the best interpretation of the residual plots?

choices.label: The residual plot for model I indicates that a quadratic model is the most appropriate among the three models.
The residual plots for models I and III indicate that either model is appropriate and better than model II.
The residual plot for model II indicates that it is the most appropriate among the three models.
All the residual plots indicate that any of the three models are appropriate for the prediction.
All the residual plots indicate that none of the three models is appropriate for the prediction.

content.answer: The residual plot for model II indicates that it is the most appropriate among the three models.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Calculate summary statistics, relative positions of points within a distribution, correlation, and predicted response.
